password.description: The password to use to encrypt the private key. If encryption is not required, please leave it blank.

AlgorithmEnum.description: SHA-256 - The SHA-2 hash using 256 bits. SHA-384 - The SHA-2 hash using 384 bits. SHA-512 - The SHA-2 hash using 512 bits.

commonName.description: The common name of the certificate.

createDate.description: The date that creates the certificate.

notBeforeDate.description: The start date of the certificate.

notAfterDate.description: The expires date of the certificate.

title.description: The title for the certificate authority.

revocationDate.description: The date after which the certificate be revoked.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the certificate.

publicKeyBase64.description: The public key of the certificate.

certificateAuthorityName.description: The name of the certificate authority that issued this certificate.

locality.description: The locality included in the certificate.

state.description: The state included in the certificate.

country.description: The country included in the certificate.

organizationUnit.description: The organization unit of the certificate.

keyUsages.description: The key usages of the certificate.

items.description: The key usages of the certificate.

privateKeyBase64.description: The private key of the certificate.

csrString.description: The certificate signing request that should be signed by the CA.

extendedKeyUsages.description: The extended key usage of the certificate.

items.description: The extended key usage of the certificate.

id.description: The unique for this simple certificate enrollment protocol key.

description.description: Description of the item for reference.

enabled.description: Indicates whether this key should be used.

name.description: The reference name of the item.

allowedSubnets.description: If populated, only the IPs or subnets specified will be allowed to utilize the simple certificate enrollment protocol server using this key.

blockedSubnets.description: If populated, the IPs or subnets specified will be blocked from utilizing the simple certificate enrollment protocol server using this key.

challengePassword.description: If checked, the client will need to provide this password during the exchange.

expirationDate.description: The expire date for the key.

overrideDays.description: If greater than 0, this overrides the expiration date in the certificate template for certificates generated using this key.

scepKey.description: The shared secret used as the key within the URL.

cnValue1.description: The certificate signing requests created as part of the simple certificate enrollment protocol interaction will contain one or more common name values. The system will treat the first common name as the type of value specified.

cnValue2.description: The certificate signing requests created as part of the simple certificate enrollment protocol interaction will contain one or more common name values. The system will treat the second common name as the type of value specified.

cnValue3.description: The certificate signing requests created as part of the simple certificate enrollment protocol interaction will contain one or more common name values. The system will treat the third common name as the type of value specified.

challengePasswordType.description: Optionally specify a challenge password which must be provided by the client during the simple certificate enrollment protocol key exchange.

intuneTenantId.description: The azure tenant ID from the azure configuration portal.

azureApplicationId.description: The azure application client ID from the azure configuration portal.

azureApplicationKey.description: The azure application key and client secret configured in the azure configuration portal.

dateValue.description: The number of hours/days/months/etc to be offset from the event date when calculating when to send the notification.

emailSubject.description: The subject of the email to be sent for this notification.

email.description: Indicates whether this package should be used.

emailTemplate.description: The message of the email to be sent for this notification.

notificationEvent.description: The event upon which to base the sending of the notification.

notificationMethod.description: The method(s) to use to notify the user.

notificationMethodData.description: The data of to use to notify the user.

smsSubject.description: The subject of the SMS to be sent for this notification.

smsTemplate.description: The message of the email to be sent for this notification.

staticDerivedDateType.description: The basis for calculating the date to send the notification.

id.description: The unique identifier for this configuration.

enabled.description: Indicates whether this package should be used.

name.description: The unique reference name of the package.

allowedSubnets.description: If populated, only the IP addresses or subnets specified are allowed to use this package.

blockedSubnets.description: If populated, the IP addresses or subnets specified are blocked from using this package. Blocked subnets override the allowed subnets.

expirationDate.description: The expire date for this package.

productId.description: The product ID for the package.

productName.description: The product name for the package.

profileType.description: The profile type for the package.

usernameVariableSource.description: Determines where the variable (usable in the certificate template) is derived from.

csrString.description: The certificate signing request that should be signed by the CA.

userName.description: The certificate template contains the variable. The value specified here will be used to replace the variable.

description.description: Description of the item for reference.

additionalProperties.description: The values in this map will be used to replace the variables in the generated certificate.

variableValues.description: The values in this map will be used to replace the variables in the generated certificate.

commonName.description: The common name of the certificate.

createDate.description: The date that creates the certificate.

notBeforeDate.description: The date for which the certificate becomes valid.

notAfterDate.description: The date after which the certificate becomes invalid.

revocationDate.description: The date after which the certificate be revoked.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the certificate.

publicKeyBase64.description: The public key of the certificate.

certificateTemplateName.description: The name of the template that this certificate generates from.

certificateAuthoritiesName.description: The name of the template that this certificate generates from.

locality.description: The locality included in the certificate.

state.description: The state included in the certificate.

country.description: The country included in the certificate.

organizationUnit.description: The organization unit of the certificate.

keyUsages.description: The key usage of this certificate.

items.description: The key usage of this certificate.

privateKeyBase64.description: The private key of the certificate.

enrollmentType.description: The enrollment type of the certificate.

id.description: The unique identifier for this template.

description.description: The description identifier for this template.

name.description: The name for the certificate template.

caType.description: Which CA signs the certificates from the template.

defaultAccess.description: Default RADIUS access response will either be accepted or rejected.

policySetId.description: The policy set that is assigned to this template.

keyLength.description: The key length for certificates generated using this template.

certificateCount.description: The count of certificate generated from this template.

certificateNames.description: The names of certificate generated from this template.

items.description: The names of certificate generated from this template.

variables.description: The variables for replacing the variables in the generated certificate.

items.description: The variables for replacing the variables in the generated certificate.

networkCount.description: The count of network assigned to this template.

identityGroupId.description: The identity group id associated with the template.

apiKey.description: The API Key for verified access operations.

certRemovalType.description: The extension may remove existing certificates from the certificate manager.

enrollmentType.description: This selection changes the type of verified access and certificate enrollment that is performed.

notifyAppId.description: If specified, the app will be notified when the certificate installation is complete.

accountCredential.description: When utilizing verified access, the credentials for a google service account are required.

enabled.description: Enabling this will allow managed chrome book to auto-enroll and install a client certificate using this certificate.

type.description: The type of google service account.

projectId.description: The project ID of google service account.

privateKeyId.description: The private key ID of google service account.

privateKey.description: The private key of google service account.

clientEmail.description: The client email of google service account.

clientId.description: The client ID of google service account.

authUri.description: The authentication uniform resource identifier of google service account.

tokenUri.description: The token uniform resource identifier of google service account.

commonNamePattern.description: The pattern used to determine the common name for certificates generated using this template.

emailPattern.description: The pattern used to determine the email for certificates generated using this template.

notAfterType.description: Indicates how the date offset is to be applied when defining the expiration date for certificates that are granted.

notAfterValue.description: The method used to calculate the expiration date for certificates generated using this template.

notBeforeType.description: Indicates how to apply the date offset when defining the start period for certificates that are granted.

notBeforeValue.description: A number representing how to apply the not before type property.

notAfterDate.description: The specific expire date when issuing certificates with this template.

notBeforeDate.description: The specific start date when issuing certificates with this template.

organizationPattern.description: The pattern used to determine the organization for certificates generated using this template.

organizationUnitPattern.description: The pattern used to determine the organization unit for certificates generated using this template.

localityPattern.description: The pattern used to determine the locality for certificates generated using this template.

statePattern.description: The pattern used to determine the state for certificates generated using this template.

countryPattern.description: The pattern used to determine the country for certificates generated using this template.

certificateType.description: The use type for the certificate.

certificateAuthorityName.description: The name of the onboard CA.

OnboardDto.description: The configuration of the onboard CA.

id.description: The unique identifier for this authority.

commonName.description: The common name of this authority.

organization.description: The organization for the certificate authority.

organizationUnit.description: The division of your organization responsible for the certificate authority.

email.description: The email address for the party responsible for the certificate authority.

startDate.description: The expires date of the certificate authority.

expireDate.description: The expires date of the certificate authority.

keyLength.description: The key length for the certificate authority.

title.description: The title for the certificate authority.

locality.description: The city where your organization is located.

state.description: The state or region where your organization is located.

country.description: The country where your organization is located.

publicKeyBase64.description: Base64 string of the public key.

privateKeyBase64.description: Base64 string of the private key.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of public key of this authority.

usages.description: The extended key usage of this CA.

items.description: The extended key usage of this CA.

templateCount.description: The count of template assign this CA.

templateNames.description: The names of template assign this CA.

items.description: The names of template assign this CA.

ocspName.description: The name hash of online certificate status protocol.

ocspHash.description: The hash of online certificate status protocol.

keyUsages.description: The key usage for the CA.

items.description: The key usage for the CA.

status.description: The status of the certificate of the CA.

items.description: The status of the certificate of the CA.

revocationReason.description: The reason for revocation of passphrase. If not revoked, this field should be null.

notAfterDate.description: The expiration date for the renewed certificate. The start date for the validity period will also be set to today.

UpdateServerCertificateDto.description: A map contains the property and value to be updated

description.description: The description identifier for this template.

name.description: The name for the certificate template.

defaultAccess.description: Default RADIUS access response will either be accepted or rejected.

keyLength.description: The key length for certificates generated using this template.

UpdateCertificateTemplateDto.description: A map contains the property and value to be updated

revocationReason.description: The reason for revocation of certificate. If not revoked, this field should be null.

UpdateCertificateDto.description: A map contains the property and value to be updated

UpdateCaDto.description: A map contains the property and value to be updated
